He used that experience to combine jewelry design and traditional mosaic techniques to create ______ portraits.
The fact that you could die and you don't know when you're going to die doesn't yet ______ that you could die at any minute, at any moment.
result.chn: 你可能会死和你不知道,自己什么时候会死这个事实并不能得出,你可能随时随刻死的结论。(死亡课程节选 : 耶鲁公开课)

result.problem: If my code is correct, what should the average price be, after say, 100 days, if there's no ______.  Pardon?
result.chn: 如果我的代码没写错的话，如果没有偏向值那平均价格会是多少呢，如果没有偏向值，请说？(计算机科学及编程导论课程节选 : 麻省理工公开课)

result.problem: R And we ______ that by calling it r, l by two quantum numbers, and an l as a function of little r, radius.
result.chn: 我们把它简称为，两个指定的量子数n和，它是半径小r的函数。(化学原理课程节选 : 麻省理工公开课)

result.problem: An ______ bureaucracy with its detailed and all encompassing records gives the clearest picture of the power exercised by the centralized monarchs of the Mycenaean Age."
result.chn: 一个无处不在的官僚体制,所留下详尽细致,无所不包的记录,清晰地描绘了,迈锡尼时期中央集权统治的实行"(古希腊历史简介课程节选 : 耶鲁公开课)

result.problem: The Duke study with child ______ palsy patients is a clinical test.
Those who used to ______ America for acting alone in the world cannot now stand by and wait for America to solve the world's problems alone.
So in the end,the canon is a ______ of the winners in the historical debate to define orthodox Christianity.
result.chn: 所以最后，正典书目只是赢家的清单,他们在这场定义东正教的历史争论中胜出。(新约课程节选 : 耶鲁公开课)

result.problem: And if they do, it can be very expensive. So we see unused space as a great place to grow food that will make it more ______ for people."
The idea of risk, that economic risks can be pooled, is an ______ one that has occurred to people throughout history.
result.chn: 风险理论，即认为经济风险可以分摊，是历史过程中,人们逐渐发现的理论。(金融市场课程节选 : 耶鲁公开课)

result.problem: Also, a foreign student cannot ______ an American citizen in a job.
He could support the Compromise of Eighteen Fifty and declare it to be the final ______ of the problem.
